subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Steelers’ rookie tight end Matt Spaeth will miss today’s game against the San Francisco 49ers after not practicing all week because of a bruised quadriceps. In two games this season, Spaeth, a third-round draft pick, has 3 receptions for 15 yards and 2 touchdowns.
